pages.name: Child(ren) Information
pages.description: Please enter the details of each child in the fields below.

elements.name: childName
elements.title: What is the name of the child?

elements.name: childDateOfBirth
elements.title: What is the child's date of birth?

elements.name: relationToChild
elements.title: What is your relationship to the child?
elements.description: Use whatever wording best describes it, for example, father, step-mother, grandparent, etc.

elements.name: childRelationToOtherParty
elements.title: What is the other party's relationship to the child?
elements.description: Use whatever wording best describes it, for example, father, step-mother, grandparent, etc.
